error_load_locale: [ERROR] Failed to load locale file. Please ensure you have cloned the repository completely. File path: {path}
inf_github_token_configured: [INF] GitHub Token configured, will be used for API requests
wrn_github_token_not_configured: [WRN] GitHub Token not configured, using anonymous API requests (may be rate limited)
inf_github_token_hint: [INF] If you encounter API rate limits, please set GITHUB_TOKEN/GH_TOKEN environment variable
wrn_model_not_submodule: [WRN] Detected model directory is not a submodule (missing .git), removing to ensure proper submodule clone: {path}
wrn_read_version_failed: [WRN] Failed to read version file, ignoring local version: {error}
inf_maafw_installed_skip: [INF] MaaFramework already installed, skipping (use --update to update)
inf_maafw_latest_version: [INF] MaaFramework is already up to date ({version}), skipping download
err_cannot_delete_maafw: [!] Cannot delete {path}, please ensure the program has exited completely.
prompt_retry_or_quit: [?] Please handle manually then press Enter to retry, or type 'q' to quit:
err_unknown_error_delete: [ERR] Unknown error occurred while cleaning directory: {error}
err_bin_not_found: [ERR] bin directory not found after extraction
inf_mxu_latest_version: [INF] MXU is already up to date ({version}), skipping download
err_cannot_delete_mxu: [!] Cannot delete {name}, please ensure the program has exited completely.
err_unknown_error_delete_file: [ERR] Unknown error occurred while deleting file: {error}
description: MaaEnd build tool: Initialize and install dependencies
arg_update: Update dependencies if they already exist
arg_ci: CI mode: Do not generate local version file
inf_workspace_ready: [INF] Workspace initialized/updated, you can run {mxu_path} to verify the installation
inf_install_dir_hint: [INF] All subsequent editing, debugging, etc. will be based on the {install_dir} folder
inf_read_dev_doc: [INF] Please read the development manual ({doc_path}) sections on 'Development Tips' and 'Code Standards' before proceeding with development
